title: Polishing Shakespeare
description: Twilight Theatre Co. in association with Kitchen Theatre Company presents a sly comedy inspired by an unbelievably true story about a dot-com billionaire who pays an esteemed American theatre company to translate Shakespeare into English. A runaway hit at the Edinburgh Fringe and Kitchen Theatre Company in Ithaca, Polishing Shakespeare arrives Off Broadway.
address: 59E59 Theaters, a quick block from SUBWAY 4/5/6 N/W/R at 59 St.
